data.comment: Bahia kick-off the first half - the match is underway!
Gremio to take a throw-in in Bahia territory.
In the minute 2, Gilberto of Bahia smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Throw-in Bahia.
In Salvador a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 5, Gremio have a dangerous throw-in.
Important block from the Gremio defence as Gilberto fires in a strike for Bahia.
Corner awarded to Bahia.
In the minute 9, Bahia have been awarded a corner by Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior.
In Salvador, Isaque of Gremio is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Bahia have been awarded a corner by Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior.
In the minute 13, Gremio needs to be cautious. Bahia have an attacking throw-in.
Corner awarded to Bahia.
Bahia have been awarded a corner by Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior.
In the minute 14, Bahia push forward at Arena Fonte Nova and Gregore gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Gremio defence.
Bahia are pushing forward but Juninho's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Salvador.
In the minute 15, Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a free kick to Gremio.
David Braz gets his shot on target but fails to score for Gremio.
Corner awarded to Gremio.
In the minute 16, Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a free kick to Bahia in their own half.
Free kick Bahia.
Darlan Mendes (Gremio) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 18, Ball safe as Gremio is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in high up the field for Bahia in Salvador.
Bahia's Rodriguinho is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 21, Corner awarded to Bahia.
In Salvador, Gilberto (Bahia) misses the target with a header.
Ball goes out of play for a Gremio goal kick.
In the minute 23, Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior waits before resuming play because Paulo Miranda for Gremio is still down.
Throw-in for Gremio close to the penalty box.
Paulo Miranda is back on the pitch.
In the minute 25, Alisson puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
Diego Souza with an assist there.
Gremio awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 26, At Arena Fonte Nova, Nino Paraiba has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Can Gremio get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bahia's half?
Gremio drive upfield and Darlan Mendes gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Bahia defender.
In the minute 28, Bahia are coming forward and Gregore gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Gremio have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Gremio in the half of Bahia.
In the minute 30, Gremio's Diego Souza attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior awards Bahia a goal kick.
Free kick for Bahia in the half of Gremio.
In the minute 31, Bahia's Gilberto misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Gremio at Arena Fonte Nova.
Darlan Mendes (Gremio) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 32, Gremio drive forward but Alisson is judged offside.
Throw-in for Bahia in their own half.
Gregore of Bahia gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 34, Ball goes out of play for a Gremio goal kick.
Gremio awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 36, Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a throw-in for Gremio, close to Bahia's area.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Gremio close to the penalty box.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior awards Bahia a goal kick.
In the minute 39, Gremio are pushing forward but Darlan Mendes's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Salvador.
In Salvador Bahia drive forward through Rodriguinho. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 42, Isaque of Gremio gets in a strike, but is off target.
Bahia have a goal kick.
Goal kick for Bahia at Arena Fonte Nova.
In the minute 44, Free kick for Gremio in their own half.
Throw-in for Bahia at Arena Fonte Nova.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a free kick to Bahia in their own half.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Gremio are coming forward and Luis Orejuela gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Bahia goal kick.
In the minute 45, Can Bahia capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Gremio's half?
The first half has been concluded at Arena Fonte Nova.
The second-half has commenced. Gremio with the kick-off.
In the minute 46, Rossi is replacing Edson for Bahia at Arena Fonte Nova.
Free kick for Gremio in their own half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Alisson for Gremio who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 48, Alisson has recovered and rejoins the match in Salvador.
Gremio have been awarded a corner by Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior.
Free kick Bahia.
In the minute 49, Matheus Henrique for Gremio has been booked by Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior and will miss the next match due to a suspension.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Salvador.
Bahia drives forward and Gilberto gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 53, Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior awards the home team a throw-in.
Goal! Darlan Mendes extends Gremio's lead to 0-2.
Great play from Everton to set up the goal.
In the minute 55, Gremio awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a Bahia throw-in in Gremio's half.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a throw-in for Bahia, close to Gremio's area.
In the minute 56, Throw-in for Gremio at Arena Fonte Nova.
Bahia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Salvador Gremio attack through Isaque. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 57, Bahia have a goal kick.
Rodriguinho hits the post! Very nearly a goal there for Bahia!
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a free kick to Bahia.
In the minute 59, Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a Bahia throw-in in Gremio's half.
Bahia's Gilberto breaks free at Arena Fonte Nova. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior awards Gremio a goal kick.
Gremio's Vanderlei is back in action after a slight knock.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 61, Vanderlei is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 62, Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Gremio in the half of Bahia.
Gremio pushes forward through Luis Orejuela, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 64, Free kick for Bahia in their own half.
Matheus Henrique in Gremio has been yellow-carded a second time by Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior and is being sent off.
In the minute 65, Elber for Bahia drives towards goal at Arena Fonte Nova. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Salvador to check on Luis Orejuela, who is grimacing with pain.
Corner awarded to Bahia.
Bahia attack but Rossi's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 66, Goal kick for Gremio at Arena Fonte Nova.
The home team replace Daniel with Clayson.
Luis Orejuela for Gremio is back on the field again.
In the minute 68, Ball goes out of play for a Bahia goal kick.
Bahia have been awarded a corner by Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior.
Free kick for Bahia in the half of Gremio.
In the minute 70, It's a goal kick for the away team in Salvador.
In Salvador a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Can Gremio get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bahia's half?
In the minute 73, Renato Gaucho is making the team's first substitution at Arena Fonte Nova with Luiz Fernando replacing Diego Souza.
Bahia's Clayson gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Gremio defender.
Gremio drives forward and Luiz Fernando gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 75, Gremio have been awarded a corner by Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior.
Gremio's Luiz Fernando gets in a shot on goal at Arena Fonte Nova. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Gremio's Luiz Fernando misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 75, Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior awards Bahia a goal kick.
Roger Machado (Bahia) is making a third substitution, with Jadson replacing Nino Paraiba.
The home team have replaced Rodriguinho with Marco Antonio. This is the fourth substitution made today by Roger Machado.
In the minute 77, Bahia to take a throw-in in Gremio territory.
Gremio awarded a free kick in their own half.
Gregore Bahia.
Free kick Gremio.
Luis Orejuela is back on his feet again.
In the minute 79, The match at Arena Fonte Nova has been interrupted briefly for a check on Luis Orejuela, who is down injured.
In the minute 81, Gremio are coming forward and Luis Orejuela gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Bahia have a goal kick.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a free kick to Gremio.
In the minute 83, Lucas Silva is replacing Everton for Gremio at Arena Fonte Nova.
Bahia make their fifth substitution with Elton replacing Gilberto.
Can Bahia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gremio's half?
In the minute 85, Bahia's Clayson has run offside.
In Salvador Gremio attack through Luiz Fernando. The finish is off target, however.
Bahia have a goal kick.
In the minute 86, Ball safe as Gremio is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Gremio in their own half.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a free kick to Bahia in their own half.
In the minute 89, Throw-in Gremio.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Salvador.
Corner awarded to Gremio.
Guilherme Azevedo for Gremio is whistled offside.
In Salvador a free kick has been awarded the away team.
The second-half is over. The match ends 0-2.
Rodrigues is replacing Darlan Mendes for the away team.
Guilherme Azevedo is on a sub for Alisson for Gremio.
The away team replace Isaque with Rildo Goncalves.
